Body:
template = """
    % for file in \\
        requestattr['toc'].filenames:
        x
    % endfor
        """
nodes = Lexer(template).parse()
self._compare(nodes, TemplateNode({}, [Text('\n', (1, 1)), ControlLine(
    'for', """for file in \\
        requestattr['toc'].filenames:""", 
    False, (2, 1)), Text('        x\n', (4, 1)), ControlLine('for',
    'endfor', True, (5, 1)), Text('        ', (6, 1))]))
